meanings.definition: Very thin or slender in form or build.
meanings.sent1: The slimsiest tree in the forest swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: She wore the slimsiest dress to the party, feeling elegant and delicate.
meanings.sent3: The slimsiest kitten tried to pounce on a butterfly but ended up chasing its own tail.
meanings.sent4: His slimsiest excuses for being late were as transparent as glass.
meanings.sent5: The slimsiest thread held the kite aloft, dancing in the sky.

meanings.sent1: The slimsiest paper tore easily with the lightest touch.
meanings.sent2: The slimsiest umbrella turned inside out in the strong wind.
meanings.sent3: His slimsiest attempt at a joke fell flat, leaving everyone silent.
meanings.sent4: The slimsiest bridge creaked under the weight of the passing cars.
meanings.sent5: The slimsiest excuse for not doing homework was that the dog ate it.

meanings.sent1: His slimsiest alibi for the missing cookies was blaming the imaginary cookie monster.
meanings.sent2: The slimsiest conspiracy theory claimed that aliens built the pyramids.
meanings.sent3: The slimsiest explanation for the mysterious lights in the sky was that they were fireflies on vacation.
meanings.sent4: The slimsiest promise to never be late again was broken the very next day.
meanings.sent5: The slimsiest excuse for not attending the party was that he had to wash his cat.
